game_form_name_field_assistive_text: Enter the name of the game
game_form_theme_field_assistive_text: What topic would you like to discuss?
game_form_instructions_field_text:
During this experiment, you will play the roles of Judge (C) and Real Player (B).
1. As the Judge, a) ask questions that will help you identify the genuine <topic/group>, and b) decide whether the answers were written by a human or AI.
2. As the Real Player, answer the questions posed by others as yourself.
game_form_research_field_assistive_text: Check the box if this is a research study
game_form_research_permission_field_assi: Allow game data to be used for research?
game_content_delete_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete this game?
join_game_player_already_joined: Player has already joined this game
join_game_player_cant_joined: You can no longer join this game
game_name_is_required: Enter a name for the game configuration
game_research_description_is_too_long: Maximum research consent text length is 4000 characters
game_players_background_info: Background information requested from research participants
game_lobby_player_not_joined: Player has not joined the game
game_lobby_game_started: Game in progress – joining not possible
spinner_awaiting_game_starting: Waiting for the game to start...
model_required_message: Select a language model before asking
prompt_and_model_required_message: Enter both prompt and language model before asking
game_form_instructions_undo_button_aria_: Undo instruction changes and restore original text
research_permission_form_acceptance_labe: I agree that my data may be used for research purposes
admin_monitor_table_description: Monitor view with judge and player details
playroom_waiting_for_questions: Waiting for players to submit questions
playroom_waiting_for_rating: Please rate the answers or end the game
start_game_validation_message: Starting the game requires at least 2 players!
edit_game_player_joined_validation: The game cannot be edited because players have already joined
rating_form_instructive_heading: Which response do you think was written by a human?
rating_form_justifications_assistive_tex: Explain why you believe the selected response was written by a human.
rating_form_confidence_meter_label: How confident are you in your answer?
confidence_meter_value_1: I have little or no idea who is who
confidence_meter_value_2: I am more unsure than sure
confidence_meter_value_3: I am more sure than unsure
confidence_meter_value_4: I am pretty sure I know who is who
join_game_cookies_announcement: This site uses two cookies: The most important one is a session cookie. You must enable this cookie in your browser to ensure continuity and remain logged in while browsing the site. When you log out or close your browser, this cookie is destroyed (in your browser and on the server). The other cookie is purely for convenience. It only remembers your username in your browser. This means that when you return to this site, the username field on the login page will already be filled in for you. It is safe to disable this cookie - you will just have to re-enter your username each time you log in.
game_form_randomization_field_assistive_: If this setting is enabled, the human and AI respondent's answers will be shown to the Judge in random order for each question. If disabled, the Pretender’s (AI) answer will always appear second.
game_end_reason_by_judge: Thank you for your final review; your game continues in the Respondent role
game_end_reason_game_ended: The game has ended. You may close your browser
game_end_reason_by_admin: The game organizer ended the game; you may close your browser
playroom_instructions_judge: As the judge, your task is to ask a question that allows you to determine which respondent is the group member and which is the AI pretender
playroom_instructions_aito: As the respondent, your task is to answer the questions as yourself.
qr_code_dialog_title: The QR code to join the game
qr_code_button_title: Show the QR code used to join the game
nickname_too_long: The nickname length cannot exceed 100 characters
default_system_prompt: The default prompt template for the game (uneditable):
prompt_template_not_found: Choose the game's language in order to display the default system prompt
edit_game_form_error_notification: The game configuration cannot be changed, because players have already joined
admin_monitor_end_game_move_summary: End game and move to game summary
playroom_no_more_answers_accepted: The other player has moved to final review and will not send further questions. Please continue the game in the judge role.
rating_form_end_game_instructions: If you believe you've identified the respondents, move to final review
rating_form_end_game_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to move to the final review? You cannot send further questions after moving to the final review.
final_review_form_options_assistive_text: Which answer is by a human?
final_review_instructions_message: Below are all the questions you asked during the game and the answers given by Respondents 1 and 2. The responses highlighted in blue indicate which option you selected as human for each question. Review the conversation and, at the end, explain which respondent (1 or 2) is more likely to be human and why
game_form_show_result_field_assistive_te: If this setting is enabled, the players will see if their final review was correct.
game_final_guess_correct: The game has ended. You guessed correctly!
game_final_guess_incorrect: The game has ended. You guessed incorrectly.
admin_monitor_end_game_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to end the game?
admin_monitor_end_game_all_not_finished: All players have not finished their games yet!
footer_maintenance_window: The maintenance window for the service is every Tuesday from 8 AM to 10 AM. Breaks in the service may occur during that time.
game_list_no_games: No games to display. Select 'show only completed games' to view completed games.
no_sockets_found_for_judge: Question couldn't be sent. Try again later.
imitation_game_instructions: This is a game that is played...
game_confirm_start_game: Are you sure you want to start the game?
judge_messenger_missing_judge_guess: The evaluation of the previous answer is missing. Please reload the page.
judge_messenger_missing_answer: The answer to the previous question is missing. Please reload the page.
judge_messenger_already_answered: You have already answered this question. Please reload the page.
judge_messenger_missing_player: The connection to the player was lost. Please try sending the question again shortly.
judge_messenger_missing_judge: The connection to the judge was lost. Please try sending the answer again shortly.
